text: Ezɨ Devit Sol ko itima, Sol Devit mɨgeima, a mɨdorozir gumaziba isa ghua apanibav sosi, egha mɨsozir dughiabar, Devit zurara mɨdorozibar uan apaniba abɨri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Sol mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanir mamɨn ikiasa a ginaba. Ezɨ gumazamiziba ko mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanir igharaziba, kamaghɨn Devitɨn gara, bar a gifonge.
